columns.People_ID: The unique identifier of each person.
columns.Name: The full name of the person.
columns.Age: The age of the person in years.
columns.Height: The height of the person in meters.
columns.Hometown: The city where the person grew up.

people.table_description: The table stores essential data about individuals.

columns.Gymnast_ID: The unique identifier for each gymnast.
columns.Floor_Exercise_Points: The score awarded for floor exercise performance.
columns.Pommel_Horse_Points: The score awarded for pommel horse performance.
columns.Rings_Points: The score awarded for rings performance.
columns.Vault_Points: The score awarded for vault performance.
columns.Parallel_Bars_Points: The score awarded for parallel bars performance.
columns.Horizontal_Bar_Points: The score awarded for horizontal bar performance.
columns.Total_Points: The cumulative score across all exercises.

gymnast.table_description: The table tracks scores and performance of gymnasts in competitions.
